effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 805,657 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 449,426.
Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply Insurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each Insurance! active on allies.

Gloves of the Avatar

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description: Equip: While above 80% health, direct healing you do also redistributes up to 2% of your health to your target.
Equip: You are one of the devout. Your spells and abilities have a chance of burning a nearby enemy for 372,739 Radiant damage and healing another devout ally for that amount.

Equip: The Bashful Book may read an excerpt from an Unpublished Steamy Romance Novel to the target of your spells, dealing 43,310 Arcane damage or 98,440 healing every 2 sec for 20 sec.

If the target dies before the story is finished, the ending will be spoiled for a nearby target, dealing what remains instantly.

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
